sourcesContent:
import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import {useNavigate} from 'react' import FiltroCard from '../componets/FiltroCard' import * as S from './styles' import { RootReducer } from '../../store' import { alterarTermo } from '../../store/reducers/filtro' import * as enums from '../../containers/utils/enums/Tarefa' import { Botao, Campo } from '../../styles' type Props = { mostraFiltro: boolean } const BarraLateral = ({ mostraFiltro }: Props) => { const dispatch = useDispatch() const { termo } = useSelector((state: RootReducer) => state.filtro) return (
{mostraFiltro ? ( <> dispatch(alterarTermo(evento.target.value))} /> ) : ( Revenir à la liste des tâches )}
) } export default BarraLateral
